game.name: Dragon Blox
game.creator: G RBLX Games
game.description: Dragon Blox is an anime-inspired Roblox game where players train their stats, fight enemies, unlock powerful transformations, and rebirth to gain permanent progression bonuses.

mechanics.training: Training increases your stats over time and makes your character stronger.
mechanics.combat: Players fight NPCs and other players to gain rewards and progress.
mechanics.transformations: Transformations greatly multiply your power and unlock new abilities.
mechanics.rebirth: Rebirthing resets progress in exchange for permanent stat bonuses.

tips: Train stats evenly at the start.
Avoid PvP until you are strong enough.
Use safe zones to train without risk.
